cont.entity_a: Marvel chipset bug causes Wi-Fi network crashes with patched Android devices. Router drops connection frequently, requiring reboots. Wireless N devices have connectivity issues. Router is unstable and unreliable on the 5 GHz band. Router is incompatible with certain smart home devices.
cont.entity_b: Router crashes and requires frequent reboots. Router's NAT and wireless connections are unreliable. Router loses connectivity frequently, requiring resets. Router's wireless range is poor compared to older models.

cont.entity_a: Due to 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz broadcasting issues.

Easily modifiable firmware allows for VPN setup and secure network management. Router is compatible with DD-WRT and OpenWRT for advanced customization. Router lacks MU-MIMO support and has firmware stability issues.
cont.entity_b: Router is configurable with DD-WRT for enhanced features. Router is stable with DD-WRT but has wireless range issues. Router functions well but has firmware limitations. Router requires DD-WRT for optimal performance. Router performs well with DD-WRT but has wireless connectivity issues.

Coverage.comm: Router provides good range and handles multiple devices well.

cont.entity_a: Router offers poor range and speed on both 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz bands.
cont.entity_b: Router has limited range and setup wizard issues.

cont.entity_a: Customer service provided a replacement for a faulty router. Linksys customer service is inadequate for resolving issues.
cont.entity_b: Router lacks firmware updates and support from Linksys.

cont.entity_a: Router overheats due to lack of a cooling fan.
Router has security vulnerabilities and requires frequent resets.
Setup issues with the wizard; better results using the web interface.
cont.entity_b: Router is not recommended for non-technical users due to setup complexity.

cont.entity_a: Router has hardware issues affecting long-term reliability.
cont.entity_b: Router is discontinued and lacks firmware support.

cont.entity_a: Router performs well with good speed and coverage.
cont.entity_b: Router has good management interface but requires firmware updates for stability.
Router's USB storage feature is limited and slow.
